explains: v. 破译，辨认（难认、难解的东西）；理解（神秘或难懂的事物）

sentences.en: The Coast Guard needs to decipher garbled messages in a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队需要在几分钟内破译含混不清的讯息。

sentences.en: No math, no more squinting at the fine print and trying to decipher those words with no vowels.
sentences.cn: 没有数学，没有斜视的小字，并试图破译那些没有元音的单词。
